banner.Description: Earn Any Desired Token For Free

introduction.title: Generate Interest With Low Risk & High Return
introduction.descripton-1: Stake stablecoins (USDT/USDC/DAI/BUSD etc) to earn ETH/BTC/BNB/DOT/etc for free. So you don’t BUY Bitcoin anymore, you EARN it.
introduction.descripton-2: Then you can offset the risk of a ETH/BTC/BNB/DOT holder by staking them to earn stablecoins.
introduction.descripton-3: Furthermore, you also can earn GOEN - the governing token of Goen Finance to decide significant improvements of the protocol, then earn other tokens as reward in return.

mainFeature.title: Main Features
mainFeature.descripton-1: 新たなファイナンスプラットフォームであるGOENは、透明性を有し、収益性が高く、分かりやすい分散型システムです。GOENはステーキング、ファーミングから貸付まで、主体の機能をユーザーに提供できるように設計されています。
mainFeature.descripton-2: それで、ETH/BTC/BNB/DOTなどを賭けて、ステーブルコインを獲得すると、ETH/BTC/BNB/DOT所有者のリスクを無くすことができます。
mainFeature.descripton-3: さらに、$ GOEN（Goen Financeの管理トークン）を獲得して、プロトコルの大幅な改善を決定することができます。そして、報酬として他のトークンを獲得することもできます。
mainFeature.stakingSerivce-content: Allows users to farm any token on demand and earn multiple tokens as rewards from various default pools (Stable coin pool, CAKE pool, Custom pool)
mainFeature.LendingService-content: Allows users to collateralize any eligible token (must be whitelisted first) to borrow stable coins (or CAKE or other tokens) and join the staking pools above.
mainFeature.Portfolio-content: Allows any investor to diversify their investment portfolio and better manage the value of their assets.

EcoSystem.title: EcoSystem
EcoSystem.Description: The main objective of GOEN- DeFi platforms is to decentralize theinvestment and trading process. One of the central attractions here isthat these solutions offer higher transparency compared to traditionalfinancial institutions.
EcoSystem.More: “Over 7 billion people in the world can access better finance. Why do we leave them behind?”

Tokenomic.title: Tokenomic
Tokenomic.Description-1: GOEN token will be used to
Tokenomic.Description-2: Govern and stake GOEN protocol to earn rewards in different tokens and Marketing/Growth activities.
